00034 static map<string,string> doneMap;
00035 string AfcUtil::generateJsObjectsAll(vector<string> obj,strVec files,vector<bool> stat,string &headers,string &objs,string &infjs)
00036 {
00037         Reflection ref;
00038         string ret="#include \"AfcInclude.h\"\n\nextern \"C\"\n{\n";
00039         headers = "#include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>\n#include \"json_spirit.h\"\n";
00040         if(obj.size()==0)return ret + "}";
00041         ret += "\nconst mValue& find_value(const mObject& obj, const string& name)\n{\nmObject::const_iterator i = obj.find(name);\nreturn i->second;\n}\n";
00042         for (unsigned int var = 0; var < obj.size(); ++var)
00043         {
00044                 if(stat.at(var))
00045                 {
00046                         strVec info = ref.getAfcObjectData(obj.at(var)+files.at(var)+".h", true);
00047                         ret += generateJsObjects(info,files.at(var),headers,obj.at(var),objs);
00048                 }
00049                 else
00050                 {
00051                         strVec info = ref.getAfcObjectData(obj.at(var)+files.at(var)+".h", false);
00052                         ret += generateJsInterfaces(info,files.at(var),headers,obj.at(var),infjs);
00053                 }
00054         }
00055         headers += "\nusing namespace json_spirit;\n";
00056         ret = (ret + "\n}\n");
00057         //writeTofile("/home/sumeet/workspace/inter/AfcInclude.h",headers,true);
00058         return ret;
00059 }

00061 string AfcUtil::generateJsObjects(strVec obj,string claz,string &headers,string path,string &objs)
00062 {
00063         if(doneMap.find(claz)==doneMap.end())
00064                 doneMap[claz] = "done";
00065         else
00066                 return "";
00067         string tes,fres;
00068         Reflection ref;
00069         string retu;
00070         string test = "function _"+claz+"()\n{\n";
00071         fres = "string json=\"{";
00072         for(unsigned int i=0;i<obj.size();i++)
00073         {
00074                 strVec vemp;
00075                 string data = obj.at(i);
00076                 boost::replace_first(data,";","");
00077                 boost::iter_split(vemp, data, boost::first_finder(" "));
00078                 test += "this." + vemp.at(1) + "= null;\n";
00079                 if(vemp.at(0)=="float")
00080                 {
00081                         tes += "double te_ = find_value( obj, \""+vemp.at(1)+"\" ).get_value<double>();\n";
00082                         tes += "_obj."+vemp.at(1)+" = boost::lexical_cast<"+vemp.at(0)+">(te_);";
00083                 }
00084                 else if(vemp.at(0)=="int" || vemp.at(0)=="double" || vemp.at(0)=="string")
00085                 {
00086                         tes += "_obj." + vemp.at(1) + "= find_value( obj, \""+vemp.at(1)+"\" ).get_value<"+vemp.at(0)+">();\n";
00087                 }
00088                 else
00089                 {
00090                         tes += "_obj." + vemp.at(1) + "= read"+vemp.at(0)+"(find_value( obj, \""+vemp.at(1)+"\" ).get_obj());\n";
00091                 }
00092                 if(vemp.at(0)=="int" || vemp.at(0)=="float" || vemp.at(0)=="double" || vemp.at(0)=="string")
00093                 {
00094                         if(vemp.at(0)=="string")
00095                                 fres += "'"+vemp.at(1)+"' : '\"+_obj."+vemp.at(1)+"+\"'";
00096                         else
00097                                 fres += "'"+vemp.at(1)+"' : '\"+boost::lexical_cast<string>(_obj."+vemp.at(1)+")+\"'";
00098                         if(i!=obj.size()-1)
00099                         {
00100                                 fres += ",";
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103                 else
00104                 {
00105                         strVec info = ref.getAfcObjectData(path+vemp.at(0)+".h", true);
00106                         retu += generateJsObjects(info,vemp.at(0),headers,path,objs);
00107                         fres += "'"+vemp.at(1)+"' : '\"+from"+vemp.at(0)+"ToJSON(_obj."+vemp.at(1)+")+\"'";
00108                         if(i!=obj.size()-1)
00109                         {
00110                                 fres += ",";
00111                         }
00112                 }
00113         }
00114         fres += "}\";";
00115         cout << fres << flush;
00116         test += "}";
00117         cout << test << flush;
00118         //writeTofile("/home/sumeet/server/web/default/_afc_Objects.js",test,true);
00119         objs += test;
00120         headers += "#include \""+claz+".h\"\n";
00121 
00122         //test = "\nconst mValue& find_value(const mObject& obj, const string& name)\n{\nmObject::const_iterator i = obj.find(name);\nreturn i->second;\n}\n";
00123         test = retu+ "\n\n" + claz + " read"+claz+"(const mObject& obj)\n{\n"+claz+" _obj;\n";
00124         /*for(unsigned int i=0;i<obj.size();i++)
00125         {
00126                 strVec vemp;
00127                 string data = obj.at(i);
00128                 boost::replace_first(data,";","");
00129                 boost::iter_split(vemp, data, boost::first_finder(" "));
00130                 if(vemp.at(0)=="float")
00131                 {
00132                         test += "double te_ = find_value( obj, \""+vemp.at(1)+"\" ).get_value<double>();\n";
00133                         test += "_obj."+vemp.at(1)+" = boost::lexical_cast<"+vemp.at(0)+">(te_);";
00134                 }
00135                 else
00136                         test += "_obj." + vemp.at(1) + "= find_value( obj, \""+vemp.at(1)+"\" ).get_value<"+vemp.at(0)+">();\n";
00137         }*/
00138         test += tes + "\nreturn _obj;\n}\n";
00139         test += claz + " to"+claz+"(string s)\n{\nmValue value;\nread(s,value);\n"+ claz +" _obj = read"+claz+"(value.get_obj());\nreturn _obj;\n}\n";
00140         test += "\nstring from"+claz+"ToJSON("+claz+" _obj)\n{\n"+fres+"\nreturn json;\n}\n";
00141         return test;
00142 }

00144 string AfcUtil::generateJsInterfaces(strVec obj,string claz,string &headers,string path,string &infjs)
00145 {
00146         string test,intf,intff,inc;
00147         headers += "#include \"" + claz + ".h\"\n";
00148         //writeTofile("/home/sumeet/workspace/inter/AfcInclude.h",inc,false);
00149         //inc = "\nextern \"C\"{\n";//string executeAFC(string fn,strVec _inp){\nstring ret;\n";
00150         bool fl = false;
00151         test = ("var " + claz + "= {\n");
00152         for(unsigned int i=0;i<obj.size();i++)
00153         {
00154                 strVec vemp,emp;
00155                 string data = obj.at(i);
00156                 boost::replace_first(data,";","");
00157                 boost::split(vemp, data, boost::is_any_of(" ,)("));
00158                 for(unsigned int k=0;k<vemp.size();k++)
00159                 {
00160                         if(vemp.at(k)!="")
00161                                 emp.push_back(vemp.at(k));
00162                         //cout << vemp.at(i) << "\n" << flush;
00163                 }
00164                 //cout << "\n------------------------------------\n" << flush;
00165                 if(emp.size()>1)
00166                 {
00167                         size_t te = emp.at(1).find("~");
00168                         if(te==string::npos)
00169                         {
00170                                 string pars,parswt,types,jsonstr;
00171                                 if(emp.size()==2)
00172                                 {
00173                                         test += emp.at(1) + ": function(){\n";
00174                                 }
00175                                 else
00176                                 {
00177                                         test += emp.at(1) + ": function(";
00178                                         for(unsigned int j=2;j<emp.size();j++)
00179                                         {
00180                                                 stringstream st,st1,st2;
00181                                                 //types += ("\"" + emp.at(j) + "\"");
00182                                                 st << "_";
00183                                                 st << (j-1);
00184                                                 if(j!=emp.size()-1)
00185                                                 {
00186                                                         st << ",";
00187                                                         //types += ",";
00188                                                 }
00189                                                 string h;
00190                                                 st >> h;
00191                                                 test += h;
00192                                                 pars += h;
00193                                                 parswt += ("string " + h);
00194                                                 //st1 << emp.at(j) << " __" << (j-1);
00195                                                 //st1 << " = (" << emp.at(j) << ")_" << (j-1) << "->c_str();\n";
00196                                                 string h1;
00197                                                 //st1 >> h1;
00198                                                 if(emp.at(j)=="string" || emp.at(j)=="int" || emp.at(j)=="float" || emp.at(j)=="double")
00199                                                 {
00200                                                         types.append(emp.at(j).c_str());
00201                                                         types.append(" _");
00202                                                         st1 << (j-1);
00203                                                         getline(st1,h1);
00204                                                         jsonstr += "_"+h1;
00205                                                         types.append(h1.c_str());
00206                                                         types.append("=boost::lexical_cast<");
00207                                                         types.append(emp.at(j).c_str());
00208                                                         types.append(">(_inp.at(");
00209                                                         st2 << (j-2);
00210                                                         getline(st2,h1);
00211                                                         types.append(h1.c_str());
00212                                                         types.append(").c_str());\n");
00213                                                 }
00214                                                 else
00215                                                 {
00216                                                         types.append(emp.at(j).c_str());
00217                                                         types.append(" _");
00218                                                         st1 << (j-1);
00219                                                         getline(st1,h1);
00220                                                         jsonstr += "JSON.stringify(_"+h1+")";
00221                                                         types.append(h1.c_str());
00222                                                         types.append("=to"+emp.at(j)+"(_inp.at(");
00223                                                         st2 << (j-2);
00224                                                         getline(st2,h1);
00225                                                         types.append(h1.c_str());
00226                                                         types.append("));\n");
00227 
00228                                                 }
00229                                                 if(j!=emp.size()-1)
00230                                                 {
00231                                                         jsonstr += ",";
00232                                                 }
00233                                                 //types += (emp.at(j).c_str() + " __" + (j-1));
00234                                                 //cout << vemp.at(i) << "\n" << flush;
00235                                         }
00236                                         fl = true;
00237                                         test += "){\n";
00238                                         test += "AfcCall(\""+claz+"\",\""+emp.at(1)+"\",new Array("+jsonstr+"));\n";
00239                                 }
00240                                 inc += updateAjaxInterface(emp,claz,pars,parswt,types);
00241                                 test += "}\n";
00242                                 if(i!=obj.size()-1)
00243                                         test += ",";
00244                         }
00245                 }
00246 
00247         }
00248         test += "};\n";
00249         //intff += "return ret;}\n}\n";
00250         //intff += intf;
00251         //intf = (inc + intf + intff);
00252         //inc += "}";
00253         //writeTofile("/home/sumeet/server/web/default/_afc_Interfaces.js",test,true);
00254         infjs += test;
00255         //writeTofile("/home/sumeet/workspace/inter/AjaxInterface.cpp",inc,false);
00256         return inc;
00257         //cout << test << flush;
00258 }

00260 string AfcUtil::updateAjaxInterface(strVec emp,string claz,string pars,string parswt,string types)
00261 {
00262         string test;
00263         string retType = emp.at(0);
00264         string funcName = emp.at(1);
00265         //test = "#include \"" + claz + ".h\"\n#include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>\n\n";
00266         test += ("string invokeAjaxMethodFor" + claz + funcName + "(strVec _inp");
00267         test += ")\n{\n" + types;
00268         test += (claz + " _obj;\n");
00269         if(retType=="void")
00270         {
00271                 test += "return \"\";\n}\n";
00272         }
00273         else if(retType=="string" || retType=="int" || retType=="float" || retType=="double")
00274         {
00275                 test += "return _obj."+funcName+"("+pars+");\n}\n";
00276         }
00277         else
00278                 test += "return from"+retType+"ToJSON(_obj."+funcName+"("+pars+"));\n}\n";
00279         cout << test << flush;
00280 
00281         return test;
00282 }
00283 
00284 string AfcUtil::execute(HttpRequest req)
00285 {
00286         cout << "\ninside executeAFC::" << flush;
00287         strVec vemp;
00288         string methName = req.getRequestParam("method");
00289         string claz = req.getRequestParam("claz");
00290         string temp = req.getRequestParam("paramsize");
00291         int paramSize = boost::lexical_cast<int>(temp.c_str());
00292         cout << "\nreading params::" << flush;
00293         for(int i=0;i<paramSize;i++)
00294         {
00295                 stringstream s;
00296                 string ss;
00297                 s << (i+1);
00298                 s >> ss;
00299                 ss = "param_" + ss;
00300                 cout << ss << flush;
00301                 string tem = req.getRequestParam(ss);
00302                 vemp.push_back(tem);
00303         }
00304         string libName = "libinter.so";
00305         void *dlib = dlopen(libName.c_str(), RTLD_NOW);
00306         if(dlib == NULL){
00307          cerr << dlerror() << endl;
00308          exit(-1);
00309         }
00310         string funcName;
00311         string metn,re;
00312         metn = "invokeAjaxMethodFor"+claz+methName;
00313         void *mkr = dlsym(dlib, metn.c_str());
00314         if(mkr!=NULL)
00315         {
00316                 typedef string (*Funptr2) (strVec);
00317                 Funptr2 f2 = (Funptr2)mkr;
00318                 cout << "\ncalling method: " << metn << flush;
00319                 re = f2(vemp);
00320                 cout << "\nend of executeAFC::" << re << flush;
00321         }
00322         return re;
00323 }

00326 void AfcUtil::writeTofile(string fileName,string data,bool trunc)
00327 {
00328         ofstream myfile1;
00329         if(trunc)
00330                 myfile1.open(fileName.c_str(),ios::trunc | ios::binary);
00331         else
00332                 myfile1.open(fileName.c_str(),ios::app | ios::binary);
00333         if (myfile1.is_open())
00334         {
00335                 myfile1.write(data.c_str(),data.length());
00336                 myfile1.close();
00337         }
00338 }

00340 
00341 string AfcUtil::camelCased(const string& s)
00342 {
00343         string str(s);
00344         str[0] = toupper(str[0]);
00345         return str;
00346 }
00347 
00348 string AfcUtil::reverseCamelCased(const string& s)
00349 {
00350         string str(s);
00351         str[0] = tolower(str[0]);
00352         return str;
00353 }
